column4: has the ability to upgrade to a beta release via do-release-upgrade been taken away?
you need to enable normal upgrades first, see: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QuantalQuetzal/TechnicalOverview/Beta1#Upgrading_from_Ubuntu_12.04_LTS (support in #ubuntu+1)
lts default to only check for a new lts, that's why you see it on precise (but not say, oneiric -> precise)
